Good day!

Will be there a set of controltemplate examples for simple ribbon controls (RibbonComboBox, RibbonButton, RibbonMenuItem, etc..) like the existing one for standard WPF controls in MSDN? This would be very helpful..

Thanks.

Your best bet is to use Blend.

In Blend simply create a Window/UserControl, add a Ribbon to it (along with any ribbon controls you want to template), then right click on the Ribbon/control element and select "Edit Template->Edit a copy". This will create a copy of the current control template in resources which I think is what you're after.
Thanks for the reply! I wonder how I didn`t guess about it earlier :)
